Home → Recommendations & reviews → Articles → Music at FolkEast 2015

Music at FolkEast 2015

Written by Emma Raindle · Published Aug 4, 2015

Mount the air by The Unthanks

Recorded in an old granary building in Northumberland, this is an atmospheric, jazz-influenced album.

Andy Cutting by Andy Cutting

Melodeon-player who has won Folk Musician of the Year at the BBC Radio 2 Folk Awards in 2008 and 2011. Also available to stream or download for free at Freegal.

Trespasser by Chris Wood

A mix of traditional and original songs exploring themes of the English countryside.

BBC Folk Awards 2015 by Various artists

This album features an array of artists performing at FolkEast, such as Josienne Clarke & Ben Walker, Maz O’Connor and The Young’uns. Also available to stream or download for free at Freegal.

Essential by Martin Carthy

Collection of Carthy’s top tracks spanning five decades as a master of English traditional folk songs. Also available to stream or download for free at Freegal.

Smoke of home by Megson

Contemporary folk based around traditional Teesside music. Also available to stream or download for free at Freegal.

Dust by Peatbog Faeries

Scottish instrumental band with self-penned music.

Emma Raindle

I'm web content editor.
